markdownRemark.html: Drum and Percussion Tuition offered. He offer one-to-one or group tuition on the percussion instrument/s of your choice. Drum Kit, Congas, Bongos, Timbales, Cajones, Djembes, Brazilian and African percussion.Latin American percussion and Cajon specialism. Primary and secondary level, teaching to degree level. (Trinity College London and Rockschool Graded examinations). Visiting or studio in Alhaurin el Grande. Covering the Costa del Sol, Malaga and inland Spain.

frontmatter.title: Charlie Price Drums
frontmatter.description: Charlie Price Drums - Drum and Percussion Tuition offered. He offer one-to-one or group tuition on the percussion instrument/s of your choice. Drum Kit, Congas, Bongos, Timbales, Cajones, Djembes, Brazilian and African percussion. Latin American percussion and Cajon specialism. Primary and secondary level, teaching to degree level. (Trinity College London and Rockschool Graded examinations). Visiting or studio in Alhaurin el Grande. Covering the Costa del Sol, Malaga and inland Spain.
